{{Infobox dungeon |name = Power Plant |image = [[File:Power Plant.png]] |caption = An overhead map of the Power Plant. |tokens = 1,000 |location = North of Lavender Town }} '''Power Plant''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 13,507 |- | Boss || 67,535 |- | Zapdos || 101,302 |}
===Pokémon===
* Pikachu * Raichu * Magnemite * Magneton * Grimer * Muk * Electrode * Electabuzz (boss) * Zapdos (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | [[Lucky Incense]] || 17% |}
